data.actual_result: Atom editor pane appears solid black, and top bar appears in the Windows 7 format.
data.expected_result: The pane should appear correctly, and the top bar should appear as a Windows 10 bar.
data.short_description: Starting a screenshare with another user, and selecting "Application window", causes a blank screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a voice call with another user. - Start a screenshare and select application window. - Select an open Atom Editor window. - Top bar appears as a windows 7 bar, instead of windows 10 (already reported bug). - Actual Atom pane appears as a solid black color
